summary: This is an ESP file that let\'s you have a Behemot Dragon, it adds a spellbook called \"conjure Behemot\" the dragon\'s abilities and stats are edited and he pack a few surprises under his wings.
descriptionHtml:
Spell that let you conjure a Behemoth dragon, in the original mod Behemot was a replacer in this ESP is an unique creature, meaning that you can\'t find it anywhere else in the game.

The model is slightly scaled down because he follows you way to close.

Installation:

First you need to download this MOD   [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17473]Behemoth Dragon Mod[/URL]

 
Once you have downloaded the mod MANUALLY move the Meshes and Textures folders into your Skyrim/Data folder, After that you can download this ESP and move it in to the same destination, don\'t forget to activate the MOD!

All credit goes to Zerofrost Satyr for the meshes and textures design.
I have his permission to release this mod but you have to download the model form his mod.


How to get it?
open console, type:  help behemot              and look for the spellbook (Pageup, Pagedown)
Once you have the ID number type: player.additem ######### 1 where # is the book ID.
Or you can buy it from a merchant, the book is clon of the conjure familiar spellbook.

Known Issues:
Is a big creature it must be summoned in the outside world (not inside small places or towns)
author: Azquirath
